{"id":545964179,"lang":"cpp","time":"5 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1630214620,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"20 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/545964179/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse String","memory":"23.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    void reverseString(vector<char>& s) {\n        /*\n        reverse a string recursively \n        Two pointer recursive technique with i and j \n        base case:\n            when s and i reach the middle stop swapping and return\n            h e l l o\n            0 1 2 3 4 \n                R L\n        */\n        int size = s.size();\n        int mid = (s.size() - 1) / 2;\n        int i = 0;\n        int j = size - 1;\n        reversestring(i, j, mid, s);\n    }\n    \n    void reversestring(int i, int j, int mid, vector<char>&s) {\n        int temp;\n        if ((i == mid and j == mid) or i > j) {\n            return;\n        }\n        temp = s[j];\n        s[j] = s[i];\n        s[i] = temp;\n        reversestring(i + 1, j - 1, mid, s);\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-string"}
